scripts.regenerate:all: npm run regenerate:typescript && npm run regenerate:golang
scripts.generate:typescript: npm run generate:typescript:asyncapi && npm run generate:typescript:openapi
scripts.generate:typescript:asyncapi: npm run generate:typescript:asyncapi:files && npm run generate:typescript:asyncapi:index
scripts.generate:typescript:asyncapi:index: ls api/typescript/src/asyncapi | grep -v "index.ts" | sed "s/.ts//g" | sed "s/^/export * from '.\//" | sed "s/$/';/" > api/typescript/src/asyncapi/index.ts
scripts.regenerate:typescript: npm run clear:typescript && npm run generate:typescript
scripts.generate:golang: npm run generate:golang:asyncapi && npm run generate:golang:openapi
scripts.generate:golang:openapi: cross-os generate:golang:openapi && cross-os mkdir:golang:openapi && mv ./internal/generated-sources/tmp/model_*.go ./internal/generated-sources/openapi/ && rm -rf ./internal/generated-sources/tmp
scripts.regenerate:golang: npm run clear:golang && npm run generate:golang
